items.title: Virtual Assistant: Find, Hire, Train, and Manage

visible_instructors.job_title: Entrepreneur, Author, Chief Side Hustler at SideHustleNation
visible_instructors.title: Nick Loper
visible_instructors.name: Nick

items.headline: Work smarter, not harder: Learn how to win the war against "Entrepreneurial Overwhelm" with virtual assistants.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you'll have a complete understanding of what virtual assistants are and how they can help you in your business. You'll know where to find the best VA talent, how to hire them, and how to work with them on an ongoing basis.

items.title: Operations Management: Operations and the Organization
items.headline: Operations Management Training Program (Course 1 of 8)
objectives_summary: Match key functional areas of operations with the type of decisions they are typically involved in.
Identify key differences between service and manufacturing organizations.
Match each phase of the process used to formulate organizational strategy with actions typically performed at that phase.

items.headline: An introductory course about understanding the foundations of Customer Service.
objectives_summary: Identify the critical elements of customer service.
To be navigated through the tough mindset of first impressions.
Learn the importance of customer service

items.title: Operations Management: Forecasting and Capacity Planning
items.headline: Operations Management Training Program (Course 5 of 8)
objectives_summary: Match customer demand trends with the patterns that illustrate them.
Identify the major demand forecasting variables.
Recognize key concepts related to various demand forecasting models and methods.

items.title: Office and Administrative Management Training Course
items.headline: Enroll in the Office and Administrative Management course and achieve skills in running a successful organization.
objectives_summary: Gain clear understanding of Office and Administrative Management
Understand your roles and responsibilities as an effective administrator
Be a perfect business administrative and manage the office

items.title: Lean Six Sigma Black Belt Course

objectives_summary: Prepare for Lean Six Sigma Black Belt Certifications
Perform 'real' data analysis using Minitab
Solve complex problems as a six sigma proficient Black Belt

objectives_summary: Master the fundamental core concepts within ETRM
Learn the intricacies of the different energy commodity value chains - Oil, Gas, Coal and Power
Provide real world examples and case studies during interviews, presentations and sales pitches

items.title: Root Cause Analysis
items.headline: Root Cause Analysis is a method that is used to deal with a problem, error or failure by finding the ‘origin of problem.
objectives_summary: Explain What is Root Cause Analysis
Define Root Cause Analysis
Explain the Importance of Root Cause Analysis

items.title: Financial Accounting–Inventory & Merchandising Transactions
items.headline: Merchandising transaction including purchase and sale of inventory, discounts, and returns. FIFO, LIFO, Average Methods
objectives_summary: Inventory Costing
First In First Out (FIFO) cost flow method
Last In First Out (LIFO) cost flow method

items.title: Operations Management: Management of Quality
items.headline: Operations Management Training Program (Course 7 of 8)
objectives_summary: Identify the key differences between quality in manufacturing and service operations.
Match quality performance objectives with indicators that are normally used as their measure.
Identify quality management principles.

items.title: How to Build a Supply Chain Model in Microsoft Excel
items.headline: Learn how to develop an end-to-end multi-echelon supply chain model in Microsoft Excel.
objectives_summary: Understand & develop the supply chain conceptual model
Understand the static & dynamic data required for the model
Develop a monthly bucket supply chain model in Microsoft Excel

items.title: Supply Chain Management in a VUCA World
items.headline: Perform a deep dive into the world of supply and demand, sourcing, inventory and logistics witin an uncertain world
objectives_summary: What supply chain management is about
Why is supply chain management not the same as business process management or logistics
Supply chain elements such as the SCOR model

items.title: Operations Management in small businesses: key techniques
items.headline: A toolkit for making small business operations effective and efficient
objectives_summary: Successfully apply operations management techniques in a small business
Develop and implement operations that can deliver business strategy
Evaluate and select an operations management technique to deliver a specific need

objectives_summary: How To Find Carriers
